Title: Pokémon 3: The Movie
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Norman J. Grossfeld (english version), Michael Haigney (english version), Takeshi Shudo
Actors: Rica Matsumoto, Veronica Taylor, Rachael Lillis, Ikue Ôtani
Plot: In the town of Greenfield, a young, lonely girl's dreams and wishes are brought into reality by a collective of reality-warping Pokémon.
